alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 12:49AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Webb County through 115 AM CDT... At 1248 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rio Bravo, or 13 miles south of Laredo, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laredo and Rio Bravo. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 726 and 734. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
